name: TrendingTool.io

Tokenized Revenue Model The platform utilizes a tokenized revenue model, employing blockchain or cryptocurrency tokens for transactions. This enhances security, transparency, and efficiency, providing users with a decentralized method to engage with the platform's services. 100% of site revenue is bought back into Trending Toolâ€™s Solana token.
